pullrequest.title: UserCmdManager using first name which comes up on namespace, not the world name.

content.raw: Yes a test would be possible if we just create a UserCmdManager after loading anything on the namespace (doesn't even need to be a world) and then try to connect to the \`\`UserCmdManager\`\`. Not sure this is really worth it though for this mini change,  it's quite obvious that if we now add the parameter then it will be published on the right namespace… but let me know if you'd like me to add a test anyway, can do :)
content.html: Yes a test would be possible if we just create a UserCmdManager after loading anything on the namespace (doesn't even need to be a world) and then try to connect to the ``UserCmdManager``. Not sure this is really worth it though for this mini change, it's quite obvious that if we now add the parameter then it will be published on the right namespace… but let me know if you'd like me to add a test anyway, can do :)
